Check out my impressive résumé

I have been doing this stuff for almost 26 years!

Career Biography

I have an unequivocal passion for programming and I.T in general, but especially for creating modern, well-designed websites that actually work. In my honest opinion, there are far too many live websites that have seemingly been thrown together nonchalantly and unintuitively, with some features taking great effort to utilise, if they work at all!

Given the time and permission, I would endeavour to fix them all, but failing that, I simply wish to work for clients that appreciate and strive for the same level of usability and design ingenuity.

I believe my extensive background and skill set in the areas of desktop and web development speak for themselves and that I would be a great credit to any organisation, and even to a single-person client.

Employment History

Full Stack Web Developer

Madlin Projects Pty. Ltd., Sydney (July 2015 – August 2016)

Key Responsibilities:

  • Predominantly worked as a contractor on the front end of an extensive maintenance scheduling and HR management system for the Royal Australian Navy
  • Assisted in back end development and maintenance, along with two other web developers
  • Formed an integral part of a small team of employees (only three of us were involved in the actual design and development process; one more performed business analysis duties)

Achievements:

  • Learned much about stored procedures in SQL Server 2008 as well as Entity Framework 6 on the back end, and jQuery/JavaScript on the front end

  • Initially used TFS for version control, then eventually transitioned to Git, so I am now adept at using both
